title: Looking for adc or sup for DUO RANKED G+
body:
Hi my names Jayden and my IGN is Jayden kun. Add me in game if your interseted

What do i play?
Well for some time now i have been mainly playing bot lane. Barely leaving i find myself with a great knowledge of both roles and believe that i am pretty much very good at both. However i have been supporting for a while longer then i have been going adc and would find that role more comfortable. However with me being able to do both i do not mind you being and adc or support because it works out fine.
What i expect from you ?
I am looking for a competent gamer that plays nightly. I also would like it if you have a decent headset for communication and skype or Ts is a must. One or the other is ok im not really phased jsut as long as we have a good way of communication. If you dont have a headset dont bother messaging me anyway. I am a very dedicated player, i regularly play league. 

Any other requirements will be sorted in game.

replies.body: I would be interested to duo with you. Just to be assured you could play some normals with me. IGN Jon15 Gold 5. either TS or Skype.
